Digital_Input.label: Digital Input
Digital_Input.description: Generic digital input for non-specific sensors

Digital_Input_State.label: Digital Input State
Digital_Input_State.description: The current state of a digital input.

Digital_Input_Counter.label: Digital Input Counter
Digital_Input_Counter.description: The cumulative value of active state detected.

Digital_Input_Polarity.label: Digital Input Polarity
Digital_Input_Polarity.description: The polarity of the digital input as a Boolean (False = Normal, True = Reversed).

Digital_Input_Edge_Selection.label: Digital Input Edge Selection
Digital_Input_Edge_Selection.description: The edge selection as an integer (1 = Falling edge, 2 = Rising edge, 3 = Both Rising and Falling edge).

Application_Type.label: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

Sensor_Type.label: Sensor Type
Sensor_Type.description: The type of the sensor (for instance PIR type)
